discover.instruction: Read this story. Notice the highlighted words before nouns.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай историю. Обрати внимание на выделенные слова перед существительными.

content.text: I have <highlight>a</highlight> cat. <highlight>The</highlight> cat is white. I also have <highlight>a</highlight> dog. <highlight>The</highlight> dog is brown. Yesterday, I saw <highlight>an</highlight> elephant at <highlight>the</highlight> zoo! <highlight>The</highlight> elephant was huge. I took <highlight>a</highlight> photo. <highlight>The</highlight> photo is beautiful. I live in <highlight>a</highlight> small apartment. <highlight>The</highlight> apartment is near <highlight>the</highlight> park.
content.question: When do we use 'a', when 'an', and when 'the'?
content.question_ru: Когда мы используем 'a', когда 'an', а когда 'the'?

theory.title: How to use A, AN, THE

points.example: I have a car. I saw a bird.

points.rule: A + consonant sound, AN + vowel sound
points.rule_ru: A + согласный звук, AN + гласный звук
points.example: a book, a university / an apple, an hour
I have a cat. The cat is white.

points.rule: THE = unique things (the sun, the moon, the sky)
points.rule_ru: THE = уникальные вещи (the sun, the moon, the sky)
points.example: The sun is bright. The sky is blue.

comparison_table.example: a book, a house, a university
an apple, an hour, an umbrella

notice.instruction: Find all articles (a, an, the) and explain why each is used.
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все артикли (a, an, the) и объясни, почему использован каждый.

tasks.text: I live in a small town. The town is beautiful. There is an old church in the center. The church is 200 years old. I have a job at a hospital. The hospital is near my house. Every day, I see the same people on the bus. I have an umbrella because it often rains.

find.reason: second mention, we know which town
specific - the center of this town

notice.reflection_question: What is the difference between 'I have a car' and 'The car is red'?
notice.reflection_question_ru: В чём разница между 'I have a car' и 'The car is red'?

exercises.instruction: Complete with a, an, or the.

questions.explanation: Unique things - only one Earth and Sun

sentences.incorrect: I need an umbrella. A umbrella is in the car.
sentences.correct: I need an umbrella. The umbrella is in the car.

sentences.incorrect: He goes to the school every day.
sentences.correct: He goes to school every day.
sentences.explanation: No article with 'go to school' (as a routine)

produce.instruction: Describe your room using a, an, the correctly.
produce.instruction_ru: Опиши свою комнату, правильно используя a, an, the.
prompts: What furniture do you have? (a bed, a desk...)
What can you see from the window?
produce.example: I have a small room. There is a bed near the window. The bed is comfortable. I have a desk and a chair. The desk is brown. There is an old lamp on the desk. The lamp was my grandmother's.

texts.title: A Day at the Zoo
texts.content: Yesterday, I went to the zoo. I saw a lion. The lion was sleeping. Then I saw an elephant. The elephant was eating. There was a monkey on a tree. The monkey was funny. I had a great day. The zoo is my favorite place.

texts.title: My Apartment
texts.content: I live in an apartment. The apartment is small but nice. There is a kitchen and a bedroom. The kitchen has a table and four chairs. The bedroom has a bed and a wardrobe. I love the view from the window.

texts.title: A New Friend
texts.content: I met a new friend today. The friend is from Spain. She is an artist. The artist paints beautiful pictures. She gave me a painting. The painting is of the sea. I love the colors.

texts.title: The Weather
texts.content: Look at the sky! The sun is shining. There is a cloud. The cloud looks like a dog. I love the weather today. It's a perfect day for a walk in the park.

texts.title: Shopping
texts.content: I went to a store. The store was big. I bought a shirt and an umbrella. The shirt is blue. The umbrella is red. I also bought a book. The book is about history. It was a good shopping day.
